text: Scam they take £180 per room and say there is an extra £29.00 for security and you'll get it bag one massive scam it's goto be happening to everyone and they just fob you off and get away with it I know you pay tax on room It dose say that but take extra money and not give it back is just wrong as we're from England you would think they wouldn't want people to not want to go to new york a second time but we loved it but hotel edison is a scam . Hotel.  !!!!

title: The most Luxurious stay!!
text:
A quick note to express my profound admiration for the Edison Hotel staff!

I have had another Luxury stay at 
Hotel Edison 🌟

Let me introduce myself; I am Debra Ovall, Co-Producer of Singles in the City-DC, Philanthropist Awarded Movie Actress with JCL Productions, International Commercial Model, Awarded Runway Fashion Model, all Published.  I do enjoy a Luxurious stay while on assignment during NYFW. 

For that reason I have returned to the Hotel Edison and will return again!! I've already shared with friends & family and I have recommended Hotel Edison for their future stays 💎

As a Runway Model during NYFW for several designers and shows, it is a very busy time for me.   Having such an extraordinary atmosphere of Luxury presented by the Edison Hotel staff made my stay beautiful, Easy & Successful.  Thank You!

Thank you 	Fehat Begolli -ex:7203 (who is was AMAZING)  For the best room in the hotel🏆
Thank you District Manager & Scott Geres, General Manager for helping to make my stay Unforgettable!!

See you on my next trip to NYC 🗽
Thank you!

Great Success!
Debra Ovall
 (Rm. 2102)
IMDB:  Debra Ovall
IG:  Debralovall / Debraovall.TV / Debraovall
YouTube: Debra Ovall
Debraovall@ymail.com 
703.472.3810

title: Great location—would definitely come back here!
text: Our room with the king-sized bed had plenty of space for the two of us. Everything in the room was clean and attractive. The staff was friendly and helpful for the most part. Only issue was being told there was no free breakfast for guests, when that is included in your fees. The grab-and-go breakfast was good. You just have to go to the desk with ID to get your vouchers. The hotel is in a great location—walking distance to Penn Station, Central Park, Times Square, restaurants and theaters. There was scaffolding outside our windows, but no construction work was done while we were there Friday-Sunday.

title: THE EDISON
text: Hanniel was very friendly and helpful at check in! Room is clean and satisfactory. I need to ask for some shaving cream so we'll see how that goes. The hotel was easy to find and very convenient location. Have not tried the attached restaurants yet

title: NYFW2024 stay at Hotel Edison - exceptional customer support
text:
I was in Hotel Edison for NYFW 2024 HITECHMODA runway walk as a model.  It was an hectic 2 day for us.  Leaving in rush rush to catch our train back to DC, left/drooped my small crossbody purse in the room.  I called the Hotel and they immediately connected me to the customer service where they provided me with the email address explaining what I lost.  I immediately received response back from  Jonathan Bracero (JB) that they have found my crossbody purse and the process to receive it.  I received it back today in intake condition. 
Truly appreciate and commend all involved .... Danny, JB, Alex, Jahaida, Jay in handling, working, and help resolving my lost and found claim so promptly.   I really want to applaud the involved for their outstanding customer service.
Thank you so much .....

title: Very sad and disappointed and wish I was at home and hadn’t wasted a fortube
text: So utterly disappointed. I saved for the whole year, spent a fortune to give my children the trip of a lifetime and we were put into a room facing a brick wall. It also had a radiator that must have been faulty as was very noisy We asked to change rooms and to be fair the staff changed, but the rooms were just as bad except for noisy radiator. My beautiful view waking up in New York is not happening, it’s like a prison cell. I’d hoped to give the children a wow experience and now I feel I have to snap out of this sheer disappointment to make the best of a bad situation as we’re here now :( No coffee machine either and lukewarm shower water. I’m in tears here as almost £3000 down and I’d rather be at home :( . This is the first time I’ve ever complained about a hotel and I’m not rich or have amazing standards but this is just gutting :(

title: One of the best place to stay in New York
text:
Ever smiling, very professional and helpful staff. Centrally located well maintained property. 
Comfortable bed, clean, specious room, very nice large closet and excellent house keeping services.
Wholesome breakfast and twice a week free get together with wine and cheese is an added advantage.
Anyone planning a visit to New York must try to book a room wether one is travelling alone or with family. Be it a business trip or one is travelling as a tourist it’s one of the best option and good value for money.

title: 60th birthday
text: Kezia the concierge upgraded our room plus left wine and other amenities when we arrived to celebrate my girlfriends 60th birthday which really started her celebrations off to an amazing start. The hotel is a beautiful art deco building which is beautifully designed, the rooms are spacious and comfortable, however the biggest plus is its location, right in the heart of broadway and literally on the doorstep to Times Square. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel. Once again thank you so much Kezia

title: Great Stay!!
text: What a wonderful stay at Hotel Edison! The rooms were nice & comfortable. The staffs were super friendly, attentive and helpful with everything I need for my stay. Highly recommend as it’s conveniently located. I would definitely chose to stay here the next time I’m back in New York!

title: Comfy and Fun Times!
text: Stayed with a friend here. Hotel has a very classic old school NYC vibe, but room had a modern feel. Clean and comfortable. Staff were friendly. I like the restaurants here. You can catch some jazz or Broadway singers in the hotel restaurants. Fun times!

title: The Edison is Top Notch!
text: Beautiful historic hotel right in the middle of Times Square--close to everything: restaurants, theaters, and famous sites. The Edison happy hour is top notch bringing in Broadway talent and so much fun! Friedman's restaurant in the lobby has singing waiters and The Rum House Bar (also in the lobby) is "old school" New York.  I highly recommend a stay at the Edison!

title: Your Hotel in Times Square!!
text:
Amazing Hotel in the center of NEWYORK
a few steps from Times Square! The room was beautiful and comfortable and the staff very friendly! I really appreciated when I arrived the welcome from Mr. Rommel very professional and cordial. 
I will be back for sure!

title: Ótimo próximo a Times Square
text: Hotel. Muito bem Localizado, há uma quadra da times Square. Segurança 24hs. Quartos bem grandes, banheiros grandes. Colchões e travesseiros bons. O todos. Muito educados. Possuem guarda malas por USD por mala. Todos. Muito prestativos e rápidos no atendimento das solicitações

title: Sejour Hôtel Edison du 1er au 5 février 2024
text:
Agents d'accueil peu aimables. A l'arrivée on nous demande 180 dollars de taxes diverses pour l'eau, le ménage, le WIFI etc pour les 4 nuits, nous n'étions pas prévenus de ce surcoût.
Le petit déjeuner était compris dans notre reservation mais si l'on veut s'asseoir il faut ajouter 6,50 dollars Ht par personne.sinon il faut manger dans sa chambre ou dans le hall, un peu léger le petit déjeuner en plus !
Chambre un peu vieillotte 
Le plus c'est la situation géographique,  vraiment bien placé. 
Le service bagagerie esr très bien, possibilité de laisser ses valises pour 1 euro par valise

title: Sejour new york 01 février au 05 février 2024
text:
Acceuil: passable pour la remise des cartes de  chambre,surprise 181 dollars de taxes à l'arrivée pour 4 nuits.
Petit dejeuner : réservé mais si consommé sur place 6,50 dollars en plus Hors taxes ,obligation de l'emporter du coup 
Service bagage très sympa, ils gardent les valises ,1 euros par valise et peuvent réserver un taxi si besoin

title: Would stay again if visiting NYC
text:
This is my second time to stay hear location is perfect,  rooms are big , breakfast was ok
We stayed to the front of the building and the noise was crazy !! Obviously I no this isn’t the hotels fault 
A/C was off but still made loud noise ! 
We didn’t have much interaction with staff but the seemed nice
I would definitely recommend

title: Hotel familiar
text: Excelente ubicación, muy malo el desayuno, no podes comerlo sentado, si lo queres hacer tenes que pagar 6 Dolares por persona. La atención es regular,  las habitaciones como todo hotel de “paso” son buenas pero muy pequeñas. Demasiados pasajeros para poca atencion

title: "Exceptional Hospitality: A Tribute to Christina at Hotel Edison NY"
text: Christina at the reception of Hotel Edison NY provided us with exceptional service during our stay. From the moment we arrived, her warm welcome and professionalism made us feel valued as guests. She efficiently handled our check-in process, ensuring that all our preferences were met. Throughout our stay, Christina was always available to assist with any inquiries or requests, going above and beyond to make our experience memorable. Her friendly demeanor and attention to detail truly exemplify the high standards of hospitality at Hotel Edison. We highly commend Christina for her outstanding service and contribution to making our stay enjoyable. She is a true asset to the hotel's team."

Beautiful hotel.  

Very helpful staff.  

Every where thoroughly clean.  

Vouchers for breakfast were very welcome.   

5 mins (if that) to Times Sq.   

Central to all the touristy bits, we used hop on hop off bus. 

Surrounded by the Broadway theatres. 

The tickets for shows can be brought cheaper than through the hotel, so that just one small negative to be aware of.

title: Hotel is fine
text:
The hotel location is great and the room had a comfortable view and was bigger than some rooms in NYC.

What let this hotel down for me was the staff - they all seemed very unhelpful and inconvenienced by guests. Particularly the door staff are who have upset me as they didn't so much as open the door once throughout the whole 3 night stay -
I don't mind this, I don't need someone to open a door for me, however when I left the hotel I ordered a cab using Curb to go to the airport, and this seemed to annoy the door staff, who then also made a remark about me to the cab driver and made the journey feel very awkward... was I wrong to use Curb?! If the door staff have not interacted with me once throughout the whole stay, why would I bother them for a taxi.

It's a shame that this negative experience leaving the hotel was my last impression of it, and I wouldn't stay again.

title: Another great stay.
text:
This is not my first time at this hotel.
We love the hotel Edison. Close to times square about a 3 min walk.
We have always found the staff more than helpful and always willing to help so you get the best out of your stay.
Rooms basic and may have the odd bit of chipped paint here and there but they are clean which is the main thing.
Beds, towels and rooms cleaned daily to a good standard. The rum house is a must for the end of day toddy before bed.
Grab and go breakfast is great even if you go out for breakfast, you could eat what you picked up later in the day if not eaten first thing.
Try using your voucher at carve which is to the left of hotel at end of block.
I'm sure when we are back in NY the hotel Edison will welcome us as always. I went Jan 2024 with my son for his 21st birthday, the hotel made the room extra special with some things for him to celebrate with. Snacks etc. Thank you.

title: Wonderful trip and stay in the Edison, highly recommend.
text:
We had the most amazing 4 days in Hotel Edison and just got home today to Ireland. From Christina in reception who greeted us warmly on our arrival and was so super helpful to us as we are a family of 6 and we'd booked 3 rooms....All were exceptionally clean, room service was excellent and we could not fault this hotel in any way.
Thank you Edison hotel, especially Christina for making our stay so special.

title: Great location.
text:
Fantastic location in Times Square everything is close at hand including the theatres.
Room was ok bathroom very good great amenities and shower the hotel itself is lovely.
Very good staff apart from one girl when we went for breakfast on our first day so rude it  was unbelievable so we didn’t go back in we went to Carve instead.

title: A wonderful clean experience!
text: This is a wonderful hotel!  Very clean and the beds are comfortable. They even leave little snacks for you in your room when you first arrive. I was even greeted at my check out by Rommel Gopez who was very charming and helpful. I will definitely be back.

title: Great location, friendly workers!
text: Location is awesome, great restaurants and shops nearby. The small gym has everything you need to get a good workout in. Staff were all awesome especially Hanniel who showed us a map of the city with a few personal recommendations on food and shopping. Overall great experience!

title: Good hospitality
text: The location of the hotel is great, it is next to Times Square. The hotel has many elevators and offers three places to have breakfast, the room had a balcony manager Jonathan was very kind and efficient when I needed help, I had forgotten the charger of my laptop in my room and it sent it to my house.

title: Outstanding experience
text: We stayed at the Hotel Edison New York City recently and had an amazing experience.  The staff went above and beyond for us during our stay.  My daughter uses a power wheelchair and the layout of the room we booked initially did not work for our situation.  We were able to change to a room that was perfect for us.  Fehat Begolli was especially helpful in getting us situated quickly and smoothly making for an outstanding stay.  We also needed special accommodations with valet with our wheelchair accessible vehicle and Gio was fantastic.  Again going above and beyond for us.  We would definitely stay here again.

title: Great central hotel, Staff going extra mile to help with lost camera.
text:
Booked into hotel as a party of 4.  The hotel is really central to times square, a great place to base yourself for exploring New York.

The hotel is under some renovations with some of the rooms getting remodelled while we were there, painting and decorating etc, I think this is a good thing to see, it did not disrupt our stay.

The breakfast options were good, including a grab and go deal with the deli near by on the corner.  The hotel bar (The Rum House) is good too, especially the music, interesting that it was used for the Birdman movie.

We had a problem at the end of our stay, and I would like to give credit to the staff for their help.
As we were finishing at the hotel, the doorman organised a yellow taxi for us and our luggage.  A camera got left in the taxi, we thought all would be lost, however we contacted the hotel on the off chance they could help.
We spoke with Pia in customer services who took details initially. 

Extra thank you and credit however must be given to the doorman Gio, and Jonathan from security.  I gave them a description of the taxi driver, time of journey and my details and they set to work, not stopping until they contacted me with the good news of getting my camera back.  Thorough service.

All the staff were great throughout our stay, however these three exemplify fantastic customer services and professionalism.

We will be re-booking here for our next New York stay, especially knowing we are in the hands of great staff.

title: Lovely hotel and excellent location
text: I have recently just returned after staying  at this hotel for 5 nights. I choose it because of the location and it did not fail. Everything that we needed was within walking distance. We arrived on our first day a little early and our room was ready. The staff were lovely and friendly. We did not have coffee/tea facility’s and when I rang up to request one it was granted straight away. The safe also needed new batteries which again was dealt with straight away. This was reported and replaced by staff member Erick who was very friendly and happy to assist. I would definitely Recommend to stay in this hotel to anybody visiting NY and if I return I will be choosing this hotel.

title: Chambre qui ne sent pas bon et accueil froid de la réceptionniste
text:
Ne prenez pas la Classic 1 bed room
Nous sommes arrivés hier soir
Accueil de la réceptionniste peu amical et non souriante
40$ de fees obligatoires par nuit (pour la wifi dans la chambre, deux bouteilles d’eau et un petit déjeuner que nous pouvons récupérer à emporter, dans deux points de vente. Notez qu’il faut payer 6$ de plus, si nous souhaitons déjeuner sur place) +  taxes de la ville,  en plus de notre réservation + 300$ de caution pour une chambre qui sent mauvais, vétuste et bruit des machines extérieures sur le toit voisin et sans rideaux (stores non occultants) au 7eme étage 
Pour notre première nuit à New York, le résultat est loin de nos attentes
Même si l’endroit est bien situé par rapport à Time Square, l’accueil et la chambre serait à revoir (bien loin des photos fournies par l’hôtel, que nous avons réservé via Opodo)

title: H8ghly recommended
text: We enjoyed our stay immensely. The location is superb and the staff are extremely helpful. I left my car and house keys and the security team went the extra mile to get my property back to me across the other side of the US in time for my return to the UK. Would recommend without reservation.

title: Absolutely Fantastic Hotel
text: My son and I stayed here for 4 nights at the beginning of January. We chose this hotel because of its location, which literally could not be any better, it’s right at Times Square which is handy for everything. Check in was very smooth which was a relief after a full days travel. Our room was spacious, well equipped, very clean and had a nice cosy feel to it. The beds were super comfortable. Our room was clean and tidy every day for us returning back from sightseeing with fresh towels too. Breakfast was the best hotel breakfast I’ve ever had! We chose the sit down breakfast every morning except one where we went for the grab and go option. The choice for both options was fantastic and really set us up for the day. The staff were absolutely amazing, so friendly and attentive, nothing was too much trouble. We had a minor issue with our room and they had it resolved in jig time no problems at all. Check out was smooth and they even held our luggage for us as our flight was in the evening. I honestly can’t recommend this hotel enough, I hope to return to New York again and when I do I’ll be staying here again for sure.

title: Excellent location, services and cleanliness an issue
text:
Hotel rooms need updating, major heat source in bathroom that meant we had to have air con on full blast to counteract, room was adequate, dirty around carpet edges etc. But bed was comfy and changed daily. Breakfast options leave a lot to be desired but recommend you got to Carve which was included as grab and go was poor to say the least....concierge was a rip off, booking direct is best for transfers and tickets for shows best on we sites.

Service is bar was average, ordered a lager and was frequently left waiting and only when the barman came around and saw me staring did I get my drink.

The rum bar is good for choice and has lots of character, but with every thing is expensive. Hotel is central, incredibly central for Times Square and Broadway shows, but for me, stay a little further out and get a cleaner and better experience

title: Good and bad depending on what’s important to you.
text: Great location. Housekeeping, cleanliness, bed and pillows A+!  Don’t miss a cocktail at rum house, singing waiters at Friedmans. Best meal of 4 days at bond 45. Felt safe. Too warm in room and loud banging from pipes in walls kept me sleep deprived though. Sink has no layoff space for toiletries. Free bottled water. Coffee maker upon request.  Front desk refused request for glass wine glasses in room.   Would stay there again if I could be assured of no nightly pipe banging sounds from heating system.

title: Terrible and still here.
text:
Fantastic location but spoilt by the absolute diabolical attitude of the staff on the front desk. Rude and abrasive on check in to guests. No Hello, welcome to Hotel Edison and proceed to check customers in with a friendly demeanour. They demanded ‘passport’ and made us feel like we had walked in off the street to inconvenience them. 

The hidden charges on resort fees are basically just a way to rob guests of more money. Apparently it’s for amenities and perks but there aren’t even tea or coffee facilities in the rooms. The bathroom is in the wardrobe and the staff can’t even crack a smile so not sure what the fees are that we now have pay on checkout. 

Bed and breakfast option is also another way to stealthy grab money from guests. They advertise its bed and breakfast and then demand a $6.50 charge to sit down per person plus tax and gratuity on top. 

The hotel is very dated and not in a great condition. However, all of those things could be overlooked had it not been the terrible service of the rude staff. 

Overall I would not recommend anyone to stay at this hotel until the staff have received front of house training and lessons in basic manners and respect.

title: Great quick couples trip!
text: My wife and I stayed at the Hotel Edison.  Prime location. Super fast check in / check out you do at a kiosk. Nice staff. Clean rooms. We were in room 1805. Everything was great for a quick couples weekend.  Room was a little warm, but ok.  Shower water pressure was ok. I stayed here back in 1988 and was glad to come back.  Will book again. Thanks.  FYI really no issues getting an elevator.  Water bottles in room.

title: Edison experience
text:
Very good hotel right in the center of New York,clean and nice. Welcoming stuff
They offer very interesting walking tours around different parts of Manhattan every day.
Though it's located just next to Times square the prices are really good.

title: Fantastic staff & hotel
text:
From the time we booked until check out the Edison was fabulous as usual. We had a lot of staff taking care of us and a special mention to Danny O Brien. Really made us feel at home and went beyond our expectations. The personal touches really helped us when we needed it most!

Location is perfect for hitting all the sites and shopping. Close to the lively Times Square but quiet enough to sleep the night away after long days in the city. 

So close to broadway, we didn’t plan many shows but ended up seeing 2! 

Signature Rooms at the Edison are spacious and modern and the service staff are so hard working, the place was spotless clean. 

I really hope I get to go back to the Edison for my 3rd time at some stage in the future. For now I’ll have to just dream about the comfortable beds and fluffy pillows!

title: mini vacation
text: BEWARE!!!!! There is a huge COMPULSARY hidden cost not stated by the hotel anywhere when booking (apart from referring to additional fees) of $40 per night for a couple plus taxes which is for hotel facilities. Apart from WiFi which one would normally expect to pay for the rest of the so called facilities were irrelevant to guests such as ourselves and therefore should be optional or at the very least included in the room fee and not referred to as additional fees

title: January in NYC stay
text: Stayed with cousins for 4 nights. Hotel is great location especially for theatres. Rooms were clean and comfortable but make sure you bring your own usb plug as there were none in room. Loved the free breakfast at Carve down street. Do not have the free one in hotel.  Would stay there again.

title: Simply the BEST
text: This is where we stay each time we come to the city. The service is outstanding! The accommodations are top notch, while being affordable. The dining options are convenient and delicious. Centrally located, making walking, catching the Subway etc, a breeze!

title: Warm, Friendly, and Professional
text: I cannot say enough good things about the Hotel Edison. From the front of the house to the back of the house, everyone is friendly, courteous, and professional. This was our 8th year that our group of food and theatre lovers stayed at this historic property. Many members of our group often return at different times during the year and this is where they stay!!! Thank you, Hotel Edison for your welcome and generous hospitality.

title: Amazing hotel ruined by rude staff
text:
First long haul flight so need to express how we was left feeling at check in . Saturday evening walked in to a rude lady who didn’t even give eye contact saying just the word ‘passport’ . Then rudely said everyone’s passport , I replied you only said for mine to which my friend said she smirked . 
Not hello how was your flight , no pleasantries at all !!!! 
Further more of booking bed and breakfast we are rudely explained to the next day by a gentleman that only half the party get breakfast vouchers per night .
Can’t remember seeing on my booking bed and breakfast for half the party 🤣🤣
Tired after a long flight and feeling vulnerable in a new country it was awful to be greeted how we was . 
Hotel is lovely and some lovely luggage and attendance guys but seriously there needs to be some hospitality training for some of the reception team . 
Such a shame as it’s a great location , beautiful and clean hotel but that doesn’t matter when you don’t feel welcome at all .

title: Mixed review
text: We have just returned from 4 nights at the Edison. The hotel was nice, rooms were average. The bedroom and beds are lovely but the bathrooms are small and could do with being refurbished. The shower was cold, no hot water and the air con / radiators in the room were loud and kept us awake at night. And the tv was a nightmare to work. Unable to use the movies and often lost signal. We found the staff rude and any issues that we may of had we didn’t want to raise it with the hotel out of fear of the rude staff. I probably would stay again as in New York you are barely in your room but I would hope the pleasantness of the staff would improve!

title: VERY NICE HOTEL
text:
The hotel was nice
The staff was nice
The location was great
Our overall stay was lovely
We decides to switch hotels at the last minute after reading the reviews from the other location and was not disappointed at all  with Hotel Edison!

title: Fabulous experience
text: Don’t moan about the street noise etc, it’s a city hotel in a bustling location! Comfortable, clean room, everything you needed was provided.  Couldn’t  fault it, wonderful experience! Definitely recommend and can’t wait to return! 🥰

title: I’d stay here again!
text: This location was the perfect spot to be in the middle of it all. Beautiful hotel. I loved being able to check our bags for $1 each so we could go explore after we checked out. Staff were very kind. Rooms are a little small but what can you expect in New York. Overall, it was a great place to stay and I would stay here again!

title: Comfortable Stay
text:
This was really good place to stay near some of the theaters.
The beds were comfortable but you could hear every noise out in the hallway. From housekeeping to the other guests opening and closing their doors.

title: The hotel is old. The heater was too loud, which woke us up in the middle of night
text: The hotel is old. The heater was too loud, which woke us up in the middle of night. They also had construction next to our room, they didn't close our window until the next day. The construction guys could see what I and my family did in our room.

title: Beware of extra $ fees.
text: It was not a good deal. Rooms are small, house cleaning was pretty good. People friendly. Locations was AWSOME! I just don’t like the fact you pay for the trip and you get there and they charge you again. They should just charge everything up front.

title: Great Hotel Close to Times Square
text: The location of the Hotel Edison is ideal. It is steps away from Times Square and close to theaters and restaurants. The staff is very friendly and accommodating.  There are two in house restaurants that can be accessed from inside the hotel. There is a complimentary wine hour on Tuesdays & Fridays with live music. Guests also have access to several free walking tours.  The rooms are very nice and comfortable. I highly recommend this hotel when you are visiting NYC.

title: Excellent Location!
text: Had a very enjoyable stay! The location is about a half block from times square and yet the noise was well contained. Clean, though an old building, the floor boards were peeling. Small room but for NYC that is expected, enough space for what is needed! Lobby was large and beautiful. Staff was helpful when questions asked. I would definitely stay here again!

title: Granddaughters first trip to NYC
text: We loved our stay at the Edison.  The staff was very attentive, especially housekeeping.   The location was so convenient.  The grab n go breakfast was a good value.  The connecting rooms were perfect for our teenage granddaughters.  Loved the Art Deco ambiance.

title: Great hotel.
text: Excellent place to stay.  Friendly staff. Knowledgeable in the area and things to do.  The morning doorman was friendly and extremely helpful.  The grab and go breakfast was convenient and the accessibility to Broadway was incredible.

title: Beautiful hotel in a perfect location for a Broadway visit!
text: Staying at Hotel Edison was perfect for a weekend getaway to see a few Broadway shows. Everything we needed was either in the hotel or just a few steps away, and we felt very well taken care of during our stay.

title: Exemplifies the Heart & Soul of NYC
text: Outstanding facility; good value; classy; lovely amenities; central location; complimentary wine & cheese party-tours-breakfast; friendly professional staff.  Have been staying at the Hotel Edison multiple times a year for over fifty years.  The location is within walking distance of multiple New York City destinations and the charm of the hotel and their staff exemplifies everything one would desire for their trip to New York City.

title: ❤️ the Edison Hotel
text:
My girlfriend and her best friend are staying at the hotel now and absolutely love ❤️ 
 it ( recommended by me )  they have had  first class service from the very start of their stay , they love their room and especially enjoyed  the amenities package provided by the hotel

title: NYC
text: Love the staff and the hotel!  The GM Scott is very hospitable and helpful.  I highly recommend staying at the Edison.  Be sure to check out the Rum Bar and the singing servers at Friedman's.  The location is central to everything you want to do in NYC.

title: Excellent stay
text: Our room on the 22nd floor was a signature king room and was spacious with excellent views, it was warm cozy and well appointed. We got free breakfast vouchers for each day and went to the grab and go at bond 45 and was always nice. Shout out to kezia and Franklin for being so helpful

title: Near Times Square
text: Location is a strong draw.  Pricey. Feels like a beehive as the room is small. bathroom is only 5 ft square.  No shower door. Personal effects get wet if you take them in.  Must dress in the bedroom. Temp control is a problem.  One side cold one very warm.  WiFi inconsistent. Staff very helpful and pleasant. Needed repairs done quickly. Location is the biggest thing going for the Edison, cleanliness and staff.

title: Great location but…
text:
Edison is a cute hotel in a fantastic location but…. The room is dated, the mattress springs squeak, the bathroom is tiny (I just fit between the toilet and sink), mattress is squeaky, ac unit is extremely loud, street noise is prominent, and the flag flapped loudly outside our window 24/7.

Staff is friendly, we felt safe at the hotel, breakfast options are good, and the check in/out kiosks are handy.

title: Great experience
text: Loved the hotel wasn’t great location of the room but otherwise amazing time - we loved it there and enjoyed the location, price and staff ! We will be returning there for our next get away - thank you

title: Excelente servicio  y localización, buen trato del personal. Me encantó la pasamos súper.
text: Excelente servicio, buena habitación, buena estructura. El personal desde la entrada hasta la salida da buen trato y servicio en todas las áreas.Servicio de desayuno muy bueno entre otras cosas. Lo recomiendo mucho.

title: Great location truly NYC experience
text: We’ve been staying at Hotel Edison for many years. Each visit finds new upgrades to the Hotel. We originally stayed just because of the location, now the hotel is a desirable stay. It highlights its art deco vibe.. The rooms are small but comfortable. The bed was comfortable, the  water was hot, the bathroom was clean! The included breakfast was good with excellent service. Everyone from the desk staff to housekeepers to security and bellman made sure that our trip was pleasant.

title: Very Clean, excellent location, Friendly staff Feel safe
text:
A nice hotel to stay in the city of New York, excellent location and very impressed how clean was in all areas
Friendly staff, nice Grap and Go breakfast (was delicious with an nice coffee) 
First time in New York and the hotel was very busy but all visitors to get to their rooms was a security checking our rooms cards before to get in the lifts

title: Well This Was Unexpected
text:
I usually stick with my usual suspect hotels when traveling for work in NYC but this time I was coming up for a big, live event and invited my family to join me. I'm fairly sure I scoured the entirety of available lodging for a suite with a separate bedroom so we could all hunker down together, but have the option of privacy and...well, it's NYC and the pickings are slim (and concepts like "big" and "suite" are relative). But I was intrigued and cautious to come across Hotel Edison. I would usually never consider Times Square but the rooms seemed to be exactly what I needed, size wise so I held my breath and took a chance. I'm so glad I did! The staff was so kind from check-in to check-out. Christina in particular, was attentive and after taking a look at my reservation and seeing there was a child traveling with me, kindly upgraded us to a suite with a terrace (which, lol, it was January so I figured it was just a nice gesture), and gave me some extra breakfast vouchers, too. So sweet! I loved that there was hotel security posted by the elevator and when I arrived, there was a live performer in the lobby singing Whitney Houston, which was a treat. The enormous terrace ended up being awesome to have after the snow fell, and my little one had a blast playing in her own little snow field (thanks, Christina!). Because of its location, this hotel is near everything you could ever ask for in regards to restaurants and entertainment and it was easy to navigate to/from. The grab and go breakfast options (egg sandwiches, yogurt, fruit, coffee) are nothing to write home about, but they were good in a pinch, especially when we were literally on the go. The toiletries were really nice -- good quality by CO Bigelow -- and smelled great.

There are some downsides, though. The pull out sofa bed was painful after a couple of nights. There is a mini fridge but here's no microwave in the room, however you can rent one (~$30) for the duration of your stay. The TVs were odd and outdated. You couldn't cast to them and there was no streaming option and all the movies were only available for a fee (even funnier was that you could pay $10 to stream music for 24 hours, as if 99% of people don't have music on their phones). And the front desk redirected me to the (very expensive) gift shop in the lobby when we realized we needed a toothbrush ($5!!) so beware if you forget any toiletries...it's worth the walk to the nearest CVS. Finally, the shower was confusing, to say the least. The partition only reached a few inches and it was nearly impossible not to spray the bathroom with water while washing.

All in all, though, I have pretty low expectations of NYC hotels. Pricey, small with unremarkable customer service experiences, but Hotel Edison was a cut above and if you're traveling with kids, I recommend a look!

title: Stayed 4 nights Jan 24
text: We had a wonderful experience on our stay here, we were in the 16th floor, I was delighted with that as I had heard lower floor rooms are dated and not refurbished like the top floors, the location is perfect, just off Times Square, we also availed of the grab and go free breakfast every morning, it was substantial and set you up for the busy day site seeing

title: Decaiu
text: Hotel três vezes com água do chuveiro fria e internet que não funcionava em nenhum dia, sempre tudo em manutenção, e atendente mandando ligar para o suporte deles, está é a segunda vez que fico no hotel na primeira o colchão estava totalmente afundado

title: Construction
text: If you like noisy hammers and no sleep or privacy, this is the hotel for you! Barged into our room without knocking with the do not disturb sign, and construction crews going at it during all hours of the day and night. Would not stay here again.

title: Lisa's New York birthday treat
text:
Thank you to all the staff at The Edison. We absolutely loved our stay from start to finish, you made my partner Lisa's birthday, so much more special. 

Staff are friendly, courteous, professional and always at hand to answer questions. 

We shall definitely return to your beautiful Hotel.

Ross and Lisa

title: Lovely Stay as Always
text: I stay here a few times a year and always have a good stay. No issues on this trip, but in the past if there was a problem (very rare) it was handled immediately. They take security seriously here, which is a comfort. Lots of on-site and nearby food options, close to Times Square, theatres, and subway entrances. I’ll stay here again - literally, I’ll be back in two months!

title: Antiguo pero bien ubicado
text:
Hotel bastante normalito, aquí sería considerado un 3 estrellas, ya que se nota el paso de los años sin las actualizaciones necesarias.
La ubicación es fantástica, imposible de mejorar, con Times Square en la misma puerta, aunque el metro un poco lejos, pero sin duda lo mejor del hotel es su ubicación.
Personal profesional, con nosotros fueron agradables en todo momento. 
El desayuno, para ser uno de los pocos hoteles que ofrece desayuno, es correcto. tienes dos sitios para elegir (gratis si es para llevar, si te sientas tienes que pagar), y en ambos la cantidad y calidad era correcta.
Nuestra habitación no era de las reformadas, y aunque no estaba mal, no tenía la calidad suficiente para ser un 4 estrellas, Estaba anticuada y un poco destartalada, con una insonorización pésima, ya que se escuchan todos los ruidos de la calle durante la noche aunque estés en plantas altas. Puedes dormir, pero el ruido de fondo del exterior es constante.
La limpieza dejaba un poco que desear, no tanto por suciedad en sí, sino más bien por la acumulación de polvo en muchas zonas de la habitación, la moqueta antigua y estropeada, etc.
Los ascensores rápidos, y había muchos, por lo que no tenías que esperar mucho tiempo.
Un punto negativo del hotel son los pagos extras que requieren para casi todo, ya que te cobran una tasa de casi 40 dólares por noche por conceptos como gimnasio/wifi/agua/desayuno, algo que considero incorrecto, puesto que o bien debería estar incluido en el precio final de la reserva o bien debería poderse no pagarla y no disfrutar de esos servicios "añadidos", y aún habiéndola pagado, algún día tuvimos que reclamar que faltaba el agua y los amenities del baño. Te cobran 1 dólar por cada pieza que dejas en la consigna y un depósito de 300 dólares (que luego nos devolvieron correctamente, pero tienes 300 dólares retenidos).
Si tuviéramos que repetir, lo haríamos, por que está fantásticamente situado, pero para considerarse de 4 estrellas deben mejorar muchos aspectos.

title: Drafty windows, excellent location
text: Was a great location right at times Square.  Windows were very drafty and old so it made the rooms very cold.  We were able to switch out rooms but it was the same thing cold.  The grab and go was great as the crave pizza place was great as well as a 2nd option.

title: Would not recommend
text:
Between the view of the room being piles of garbage, the teenagers running the hallways knocking on doors (who were then threatened by another guest who said they had a gun), the rude doormen who demand to see a room key before entering (really, the entire staff was rude - it's not fair to only point out the doormen), that only a few customers get free breakfast even though it's promoted everywhere in the hotel and to top it off - receiving an instagram message that they would reach out but never did, I will never be back. 

It's unfortunate, because the room itself was very nice for a NYC hotel, besides the fact that the heater was so loud when it came on that it was impossible to get a decent sleep for more than a few hours. There is 0 interest in customer service at this hotel. It was incredibly disappointing.

title: Value for money???/
text: it was value for money. but if you are accustom to a comfortable maneuverable room this is not the place. We arrived very early the morning and had to wait until around after 3 to check in because our assigned rooms were not ready.

title: I’ve stayed at better hotels in TS for cheaper
text: I’ve stayed at better hotels in Times Square. The employees were extremely rude and talk down to you. On the bright side, all of the elevators were operational! I’ve have never had to pay $1 per bag to store my stores with the bellhops before. It is customary and good practice to tip $1 per bag, but I’ve never been charged it. Super weird experience.

title: Perfect hotel!
text: Perfect hotel, two blocks from Time Square, really good staff, hotel room really comfortable, We got the hotel really late and tired, the check-in was fast and easy, Latoya from reception was impeccable! The bell boys too!! We had a great night of sleep.

title: best location
text: Hotel is at best location, few mins walk from Time Square,  but not very clean place to stay. i would say not value for money. It is very expensive. Breakfast was ok. Outside staff was not very nice. Good luck.

title: great place
text: Was as expected. Ok place, very close to Times square. Disappointedly though, we could here the shower running up stairs. Kind of strange in such a big building. Old, soft apples handed out for Grab n GO BREAKFAST. What for $300 a night?

title: Lovely hotel!
text: I chose Hotel Edison for my first stay in NYC on a recommendation and I'm so glad I did! The proximity to Times Square and the Broadway theaters is unbelievable! Everything was RIGHT THERE!! The staff was accommodating and the beds were comfy. The rooms were a decent size considering it's NYC. The Edison also have good vouchers for a free "grab and go" or a discounted sit down breakfast. I highly recommend :)

title: Our go-to at Broadway
text: In the middle of the Broadway theater district. Walk everywhere. A bazillion restaurants within a 5 minute walk. 3 blocks to 49th st subway. 2 Good restaurants on site. Well trained staff. Clean. Importantly: we feel safe here.

title: Perfect location for hotel, not for ice maker.
text: Hotel was near everything I wanted to be next to in the heart of Times Square. Loved the decor and service. Ice machine was next to my room and kept me up all night. Convenient onsite restaurants. Didn’t realize it was under construction till I got there.

title: Enjoysble
text:
Roomy , pleasant, well stocked with towels, water, coffee maker, sugar, coffee, creamer, soap, shower gel etc. Hair dryer, iron, safe, ironing board. Well placed. Helpful, friendly staff. Baggage hold for a dollar a bag for 24 hours. Felt secure as every person was checked prior to using lifts. Great breakfast every morning.

Could've done with a little better shower pressure and maybe a blanket available in the colder months, we woke up cold in the night a couple of times. But otherwise a  brilliant stay. Would definitely come back and would recommend to others. Thank you 😊

title: No hot water!
text: $792.98 for one night and no hot water! Three email requests for price consideration with no response. This is not the customer service that should be expected. Afternoon show time precluded checking in at 3:00. Room down grade with no rate change was accepted, but this price and no hot water is not acceptable.

title: Perfect for families
text: the connecting Family rooms were perfect for group.   He had one room with a King and one room with 2 queens, each with their own bathroom.  We did not feel cramped at all.  The location is excellent 4 times square and Broadway shows.  We used a sound machine at night to block out outside noises and slept great.  All of the staff were friendly.  The included breakfast was such a great perk. The rooms were clean and ours was recently renovated. Only small issue was poor wifi and a couple issues with the room door key but that did not effect our trip much. I would definitely return.

title: Dirty & Broken Rooms
text: The first set of rooms had no water in one, and brown water in the other. The second set of rooms were better, but the air conditioner barely worked in one, and didn't work in the other so the temperature never got below 78°.

title: Great location, great service, extra fee at arrival
text: We had a great time at Hotel Edison. Service was great, the room was nice. The windows on the upper levels don’t open. Complimentary breakfast means Grab & Go but that’s alright. Restaurants and Bars are awesome.

title: Nice hotel at a perfect location for Broadway.  Some minor quirks.
text: The location is fantastic.  They have pretty good entertainment right there in the hotel around supper time, which makes it fun.  Everything is in good condition. Minor hassles with location of electrical outlets in the room, and hiccups with the check-in kiosk.

title: Très très bon hôtel
text:
Hôtel hyper bien situé à 2 min de Times square nous étions plus que ravis de sa situation 
Nous avions eu une chambre au tout dernier étage car je l’avais gentiment demander avant….
Hôtel très propre tt les jours literie,bouteilles d eaux café réapprovisionnées…
Je recommande cet hôtel à 100% 
Si j ai un truc de négatif à dire c est les gens du petit déjeuner (bond45) qui sont vraiment d un désagréable quand vous allez chercher votre petit déjeuner à emporter car si vous voulez rester manger sur place il faut payer 6dollar par table ce qui est un peu exagéré je trouve car déjà que vous payez cher mais payer pour juste s assoir pour son petit déjeuner…,c est vraiment le seul point négatif.

title: Broadway Trip
text: I would probably stay there again. I would request a different room. They are working on upgrading their hotel, so it may be better in the future.  They were also working on the lobby area. Hotel location was amazing. I realize it is a very old hotel, but a little more detail cleaning the rooms would be good.

title: Family vacation
text: Stayed at Hotel Edison for a week. The location cannot be beat. Rooms are a little small, but very manageable. Beds are comfy. Housekeeping was wonderful! Beds are comfy. Besides a/c troubles, I’d definitely recommend.

title: Amazing place with an amazing price!!
text: This was an amazing experience in NYC on time square. The hotel had so much to offer and I will definitely return! The rooms very very clean and a great size compared to others near by. The Rum House offered great entertainment and bond 45 and friedmans offered great food!!

title: Great location, average inside
text:
The heater in our room was so noisey with banging pipes and general noise we couldn’t use it over night. The other room we had was fine. 
Also the shower took 10 minutes to get hot but again the other room was fine. The reception said it’s the end room and nothing we can do. Poor
Location is perfect, staff are brilliant. Really great food in Bond 45 as well. Budget hotel in a great location

title: Stay here if you are visiting NYC and want to stay in Times Square, best deal in town and all due to the amazing staff
text:
The Hotel Edison is the best hotel in Times Square and it is all due to the staff. The Edison is a historical hotel, it is affordable, and it could not be situated in a more convenient part of Times Square. It has been redone and is clean with comfortable beds and pillows.  All that being said, the best part about the hotel are the staff. From the bellmen who help you with your luggage to the front desk staff and the cleaning staff.

The one person who made our trip was Mr. Fehat Begolli. He and Gio showed us a level of care and kindness that truly made our NYC adventure. I was there with my family and everyone felt well taken care of. We have stayed here many times before and we will stay here again whenever we are visiting NYC. Thank you Fehat and thank you Hotel Edison!

title: Good location; great staff.
text: I always get great service at the Edison. Jennifer at the front desk is awesome. Convenient location; beautiful art deco design. Great restaurant and bar with good live music every night and great bartenders.

title: Great 4 day stay in Hotel Edison
text:
Enjoyed our break in New York 
Hotel was great 
Good location 
Excellent staff
Clean welcoming room 
Not overly impressed with grab and go breakfast and no where to sit and eat in hotel ended up going back to our room to eat our breakfast

title: Times Square Hotel
text: This is THE hotel to stay at in NYC if you are visiting for a Theater visit. We saw 6 shows in 5 days a the longest walk to a theater was 8 minutes. The desk staff and housekeeping were very accommodating and helpful. The concierge was VERY friendly and helped us with dining options, walking directions and was generally a pleasant person to talk to. Very close to tons of dining options and very easy access to a number of subway stations.

title: Level of Service Is Great
text: Hotel Edison contributes to a great experience in Times Square. The hotel is on the affordable side, so the amenities were not necessarily a 'wow' factor, but the staff is very hospitable. Our room was prepared for us well and tidied up well during our stay. The Grab & Go breakfast is a great option to bundle with the room!

title: Disappointing Stay
text: Room changes and construction were a problem.  I really should be comped the first night of our stay as we were relocated to the 12th floor where we were the only occupied room. The room was very shabby and we had bugs in the bathroom.

title: Perfect Hotel for A Weekend Getaway in NYC!
text: Our stay at the Edison hotel was perfect!  We were able to check our bags when we arrived in NYC so we didn't have to lug them around all day until check in.  It was only $1 a bag which is a bargain in NYC. The hotel was clean and comfortable and we had an awesome view of The Barrymore Theatre.  The location was excellent as we spent the weekend seeing shows.  Check out was easy and we were able to use the lobby when we needed a break from the weather.  I would recommend this hotel highly.

title: Great location
text: Chose to stay here again after an enjoyable time last year. On check in, I asked as a returning customer  if we could have a high room with a nice view like last time and was told I had booked a classic room but she said she would we what she could do. she said I have upgraded you from a queen bed to a king. When we got to the room number 533, there was no nice view, only overlooking apartments. The room was very dim with only lamps and was in need of renovation. On our way out we went to reception to ask if we could have a kettle and I jokingly said could we have some candles in which she said  they did not have any. On our return, we found a kettle and another lamp in the room which was nice. Bed and pillows were very comfortable. The security is great as you cannot get to lifts without showing a room key. We did not use the restaurants on site but we did have the grab and go breakfast which was ok. The best thing about the hotel is the location.

title: Perfect hotel
text: Amazing hotel amazing location and above amazing service . I had a great time at this establishment 30 second walk to time square and in the middle of everything and walking distance to everything you need to see in New York . Restaurant was great and breakfast as well , Thank you so much for my great stay at your hotel

title: Molto buono
text: Ottima posizione, camera bella , bagno piccolo, personale alla distribuzione della colazione forse con un po’ di pregiudizi e quindi non molto simpatici mentre tutto il resto dello Staff molto cordiale

title: Not so bad experience
text: Noisy room, rude staff, hidden charges. Good location so close to Time Square and other tourist spots, accessible to subway stations. Room was ok except for the noises that you can hear from other rooms and outside the building.

title: Un voyage de rêve pour le réveillon 2024
text:
L'accueil à hôtel Edison fût exceptionnel, notre hôtesse était très gracieuse et très sympathique cela fait grand plaisir quand on arrive de voyage.
L'hôtel Edison style art déco était très confortable et notre chambre convenait très largement à nos attentes.

 L'emplacement était à proximité de Time Square et d'autres grands points de visite !
je recommande l'Edison hôtel car nous avons vraiment réussi notre rêve,
"passer un réveillons à New York" .

Merci encore à l'équipe de Hôtel Edison .

cordialement.
Patrick GUEDJ

title: Poop on the toilet- manager told me it wasn’t there when we walked in and then blamed it on my children!
text:
Disgusted by our stay here.
I have a picture of the toilet… front desk took my cell phone to show manager behind a closed door for minutes without even asking. Then manager came out and had zero customer service skills and said it was not there when we entered the room (implying we did it) and then looked at my kids and said… it could have been them!!
Never ever again.

title: Amazing
text: Central location, friendly staff, clean, comfortable, free wifi, and breakfast included? In a city with so many options, Hotel Edison is a real find. We will definitely try to stay here next time we visit NYC!

title: Great hotel and service and mostly location
text: Amazing amazing amazing , the hotel is right in the heart of Time Square . We loved every moment of our stay , walked right out of our hotel and in the heart of everything . 30 second walk into the middle of time square , valet was perfect room was great and location just WOW

title: Great place to stay in NYC
text: Perfect location, wonderful staff, Included breakfast options are a nice plus.   Only drawback is a tiny bathroom.  There is a lot of construction in the area but that is city-wide and cannot be avoided.

title: Great Experience
text: Fantastic location to Broadway and Times Sqaure. The parking is across the street which is full of restaurants. Some of which are connected to the Hotel. The staff is amazing. We had a small issue with our room and it was resolved immediately. The rooms were clean and updated. Also quiter than I expected for a busy hotel in the city. Great experience and would definitely recommend to others. We will be staying there again.

title: Hotel Edison
text:
If you want location then this is your Hotel. But that's all you'll get. Our room was dark and had a weird smell for whole 9 days.

Heating was super loud and even when turned off would turn on randomly through the night.

Windows have gaps in the seal which let in noise and freezing cold air all night.

All these reasons made sleep a nightmare and basically spent 9 days as a walking sleepless zombie.
Location was perfect for us but would not stay at this Hotel again. Way too many negatives.

title: Nice location, awful breakfast.
text:
Location of the hotel is exactly what we were looking for.
Room are very nice and incredibly quiet despite location.
The only drawback of the hotel is its breakfast. It was announced as included but we had to pay additional 7$/person to be able to eat seated. It is not a buffet and doesn’t fill your stomach. It has deeply decreased our customer experience and unfortunately it will be the thing we will remember of this hotel

title: Rude staff, tired rooms
text: Was very excited to arrive at our hotel after a 8 hour flight and 1.5 hour transfer, however was given one of the frostiest receptions I’ve ever had. It was like we were inconveniencing the staff by checking in. Was given our room key and directions to the elevators. There is a security guard on the entrance to the elevators who acts like an entitled nightclub doorman when you are transiting through. I understand the security element of non guests entering the hotel but mid afternoon I believe the intensity is not warranted. Upon arrival back to our room after a dinner out, our A/C was malfunctioning and making too much noise to allow us to sleep. I headed down to reception to report the issue but was met with attitude and eye rolling. “I’m not an engineer” was exclaimed to me over and over which left me as clueless as I was before heading down. Every member of staff I have encountered thus far frankly shouldn’t be in the hospitality industry, and will certainly not be returning to this poor excuse for a hotel.

title: Great location. Some issues with room
text:
Ideal location for theater attendees. 
Leak near window/furnace made floor wet and prevented us from walking on that side of the room without shoes. 
Furnace made loud clinking sound every couple seconds when heat was on. Prevented us from utilizing heat function during sleeping hours.

title: Quip Trip to Broadway
text: This was my fifth visit to the Hotel Edison, as it is my hotel of choice when making my annual winter voyage to see Broadway shows.  The location is exceptional.  The staff is friendly and attentive.  I appreciate the breakfast vouchers that are included as part of the nightly $40 fee, but I feel the charge is too high.  With regard to the breakfast options, the Bond 45 restaurant is clearly the best choice.  Both the "grab and go" breakfast and the sit down breakfast are exceptionally good.

title: Unresolved Situation
text:
I had an unfortunate situation at Hotel Edison and I have spent over a year and a half simply trying to get a hold of someone to help me find resolution. I have sent several messages, letters and phone calls yet no one bothered to even acknowledge my concerns. I had really hoped to resolve this situation amicably and professionally but instead they are forcing my hand to write this negative review and as reviews are important to this industry maybe one day they will read this note and might actually look at this opportunity to better their customer service and relations.

Simple communication goes a long way. I am a patient and reasonable person but I feel that my business was not at all valued and my concerns ignored.

I travel to NYC several times a year and send my clients, business associates and friends hotel referrals and recommendations on a regular basis.

I had never spoken negatively about this hotel as I wanted to give them an opportunity to make things right but seeing that they are not interested or concerned about their clients I will make a point of letting people know of my massive disappointment and concern for the lack of professionalism and care.

- A very disappointed past guest

title: "Muy buena experiencia"
text: Bien en todo sentido. Buena ubicación, habitaciones y espacios limpios. Buenos desayunos y la wifi anda impecable. Encontramos personal que hablara español y eso fue de gran ayuda ya que no hablo nada de inglés. Los más simpáticos son el personal que guarda el equipaje en custodia, muy amables.

title: Hannel is the best
text: Hannel was the best concierge we could have asked for. He helped us out when we had issues with the kiosk, offered assistance for our bags, and ensured we had a convenient stay. Best hotel we have been to by far.

title: Would stay again
text: Have stayed here a number of times due to the cleanliness of the hotel and the central location beside Times Square. Rooms are very clean and staff are very friendly especially Michelle (J) who was very helpful and gave us tips on where to go visit which was a nice touch.

title: Great Localisation
text: Great localisation near Time Square. Great service (restaurants, valet parking service, reception, house keeping). Maybe the rooms should be more isolated from street noises, as there is activity outside all night long.

title: excellent location
text: Excelente ubicación, piezas limpias y personal que habla español con buen trato. Desayunó incluido, con 3 opciones, aunque nosotros siempre tomamos la opción de ir a buscar y comer en la habitación. Muy rápido y cómodo de utilizar

title: ABBAGLIO
text:
Le foto sono aiutate da fotoshop anche nel caso di questo hotel: edificio vecchio e da ristrutturale, una bella facciata, ma interni datati.
Stanza fredda, che a New York non e' proprio il meglio a dicembre, tanto da dover aprire l'acqua calda per riscaldare con il vapore, pero' pulita
Sul sito la stanza scelta veniva raffigurata con 2 letti matrimoniali, mentre in realta ha un divano letto.
Colazione solo da asporto e boring, senza ampia scelta, sempre le stesse cose, limitate. Ovviamente sul sito non viene specificato che la colazione te la devi portare in camera, perche' se vuoi sederti devi pagare in piu'. Beh diciamo che la colazione a bordo letto mi ha delusa ancora di piu'.
Non aggiungo altro, ma ci sarebbe. Solo non raccomandabile, nenche per persone che si adattano a tutto.

title: Brilliant
text: The room was  bigger than i expected the only issue i had was there wasnt enough cupboard space for a family of 4 friendly staff hotel had everything we wanted and the grab and go breakfast was great location was great which was ideal.The location was great for us as we was right next to everything

title: The Fabulous Hotel Edison!
text:
Took a Christmas tour of NYC the week between Christmas and New Years to see a show and the Rockefeller Christmas tree. We stayed at the Hotel Edison, and could not have made a better choice. Our stay was fabulous! The rooms are very nicely appointed and the bed was extremely comfortable.  The staff is friendly and extremely professional.  Everyone we had contact with was amazing.  The rooms were clean and comfortable.  The shower was outstanding! We had lunch at Friedmans and the food was excellent. Also had breakfast at Bond 45 and again, everything was great. Food at both locations was fresh and prepared as requested. The wait staff at both restaurants was very attentive and good. If driving, i would highly recommend you use their valet parking service and book your staff when making your reservation.

I can't say enough about the space and staff. This is our fourth visit to the Hotel Edison and we have never been disappointed.  The hotel is located in mid-town Manhattan, which makes very convenient for touring, seeing a Broadway play and sightseeing.

I highly recommend the Hotel Edison and I am sure if you stay there during your visit to New York city, you will love ❤️ it and not be disappointed.

title: Wonderful experience and great location.
text: The staff is wonderful. We loved our room. The location is fabulous. We were in the heart of the theater district and easy walking distance to Herald Square, Rockefeller Center, Central Park, and Hudson Yards. We enjoyed the several great restaurant choices within a block from the Edison. We easily parked in the parking garage across the street. We will be back!

title: Needs refurbished
text: Although room was clean the bathroom sink was cracked, the bathroom vent was not working the wallpaper was broken and the window shades were not working properly. Will not stay again. Front desk personnel was rude

title: A fuir ! Personnel très désagréable et chambres désuètes ,  ne correspondent absolument pas aux photos
text: À fuir ! Hotel ne mérite pas ses 4*. Le personnel à l’accueil est incompétent et extrêmement désagréable !!! Premièrement à notre arrivée : nous avions réservé 2 chambres sachant que nous sommes 4, La réceptionniste nous donne qu’une chambre . Nous redescendons et demandons pourquoi une seule chambre alors que nous sommes 4 : réponse il fallait dire que vous aviez 2 chambres ! On nous donne donc 2 autres chambres : nous arrivons dans notre chambre qui sent très mauvais, la Clim fuit et fait un bruit incessant 24/24 et nous sommes devant des ventilateurs extérieurs donc bruit toute la nuit , nous restons une nuit et retournons demander une autre chambre moins bruyante avec une Clim chauffage qui fonctionne, nous avons pour la 3 eme fois une nouvelle chambre . Les chambres de cet hôtel sont très vieilles, petites et très mal insonorisées , salle de bain minuscule, rien pour poser une trousse de toilette bref absolument pas digne d’un 4 étoiles et très loin des photos présentées ! Le petit dej n’est pas bon dans les 2 restaurants de l’hôtel. Le seule qui est à peu près potable est celui du Carve de l’autre côté de la rue !!!  Le personnel de l’hôtel est dans une grande majorité  très désagréable , antipathique…surtout un Mr âgé , qui parle très mal aux clients et ne répond pas à vos questions ! Je lui ai demandé quelque chose à l’accueil et celui ci me répond qu’il fait les pièces d’identité !! Nous les avons donné à l’arrivée , il me répond à chaque fois que vous venez nous voir il faut venir avec votre pièce d’identité !! Je lui demande si je reviens le lendemain matin avec les pièces d’identité est ce qu’il pourra me rendre service ; il me répond c est à vous de voir ! Je lui repose la question , il me répond à nouveau la même chose !!! Bref il ne répond pas à vos questions et vos requêtes. Bref je ne recommande absolument pas cet hôtel !

title: EXCELENT
text: Local limpo e aconchegante , agradável ,localização perfeita café da manhã repetitivo mas bom , funcionários atenciosos e educados  , com certeza voltarei a me hospedar, valeu a pena . custo e benefício muito bom.

title: The Best Christmas Ever
text: This hotel was well managed spotless, staff friendly rooms wonderful and the housekeeping staff amazing. It is located to all of the main attractions in walking distance to everything. They have 3 restaurants on premises.

title: Over priced!
text: The hotel was in a convenient location to many tourist attractions. That was the best thing about the hotel. The rooms were average. We had vouchers for the restaurant. But the service that you received was not adequate. The servers took your order and did not return to your table. Your service Was different because of the vouchers. If a hotel is going to offer a voucher for breakfast with your stay, they should make it worthwhile, or not offer a voucher at all ! We were treated like step children or like we were a nuisance.

title: Reveillon na times square
text: Hotel bem localizado mas quarto pequeno, internet ruim, staff (maioria) impaciente, café da manhã que era grátis tivemos que pagar 5 dólares por pessoa e diária cara demais para o que tivemos. Compramos a festa do réveillon que apesar de animada a comida foi regrada

title: Vacations
text:
Location was best easy to walk to landmarks
Rest poor especially breakfast 
Grap and Go should be dropped at the earliest .False economy in my opinion
The staff were helpful especially when requested for information

title: DOS MALAS EXPERIENCIAS
text: Hotel muy bien ubicado pero las instalaciones de aire acondicionado no funcionan en la mayoría de habitaciones, en las que funcionan no se puede aguantar el ruido que hacen. Como solución nos trajeron un calefactor, al cuarto cambio les dijimos que íbamos a cambiar de hotel, entonces nos asignaron una habitación pequeña para 3 personas, pero agradable.

title: Disappointed
text:
My husband and I have stayed at the Edison about 4 times so it was a no brainer that we would stay here for our December 2023 trip. I wasn’t feeling well the day of check in so we decided to call and see if they had early check in. They did but it was $90. Considering I was under the weather we paid it and checked in around 11am. We already originally paid $700 for this room so we already had a lot of money into this hotel. 

We get into our room 1220 and it was great. No issues so far. We were unpacking and resting and it sounded like construction was going on above and next to us but we figured it was during the day so no big deal. It was around 11pm and we were going to sleep the horribly loud sound was still happening. We called down to the front desk to ask if something can be done but nothing ever came of it. Didn’t even offer to move our room. We came to realize our room was directly next to the elevators and every time they were used it was making waves into our room! (Why they allow people to stay in these rooms are beyond me!)  WE SLEPT AWFUL. We checked out at 8am because we were so tired we just wanted to go home to sleep. We told the front desk kindly and the only thing they offered us was half of our early check in fee back. Nothing else. 

I’m so disappointed. We paid so much money to stay here and we usually love it because of the location and amenities but sadly this will be our last time we stay at the Edison.

title: Vacances
text: Très bon hôtel rien à dire, emplacement au top, personnel très agréable, literie confortable, restaurant top, chambres propres avec un super service, cependant chambres mal isolés donc nuisances sonores un peu dérangeantes mais dans l’ensemble très bon séjour

title: AVOID BOOKING THIS OVERPRICED DUMP
text:
We booked this holiday via an agent we specifically  said we wanted a quality hotel 
We arrived initially the hotel seemed VERY old and chaotic 
We went to our room it was round the back of the lift shaft with a fire escape ladder outside the window with open public access to say the room was basic  would be an understatement just a sheet on the bed no tea making facilities
Broken furniture we went to reception asked for another room and explained why we were given another room the exact same set up we went back to reception spoke to the shift manager who told us this was because we had booked a budget room !! We definitely did not do this to our knowledge !! We were then shown to another room this had more than a sheet on the bed no broken furniture it was better but still not good we had to accept this but had to pay an upgrade fee of 330 dollars on top of the 480 dollars taxes 
( the dollar over there was 97 to £1 !! ) this room was so tiny we could barely move around the window was leaking each morning I woke up to a wet patch at the side of my bed !! The heater sounded like a tractor in the room at this point I e mailed the agent as we had paid £4000 for this holiday plus the upgrade fee ! The agent categorically denied buying budget rooms and putting a big price on !! The hotel said they have this all the time with holiday agents !!! The agent contacted the hotel manager who came to speak to us he was a lovely man and totally understood how upset we were when we told him what we paid he was shocked !!! He also told us the same that tour operators but budget unrenovated rooms and do not tell their guests it will be this standard of room !!!!
He gave us a beautiful suite and charged us no extra as we had already slept 3 nights in the cold wet room ! 
We had booked B&B the options were queue for ages in a restaurant just outside the hotel where you pay 10 dollars to sit down , or  grab and go breakfast where you are sent to the damp basement offered a piece or fruit or dry croissant and a egg/ sausage pre-made sandwich or yoghurt with granola
Then you had to try to find somewhere in reception to eat this mainly standing room only we did this twice then went out for breakfast !! Part of the reason this hotel appealed to us was the B&B option believe me this is not a good start to your day 
PLEASE AVOID BOOKING THIS HOTEL 
PLEASE AVOID BOOKING WITH AN AGENT !!!!
as they know full well they are booking budget rooms but not informing customers of this and the price does not reflect this !!!

title: Very bad service and defensive management
text: We arrived at 10 PM and they say they are overbooked so we need to get in the classic room instead of signature room and we need to change rooms next day… the value of our booked and pay room was $480 and they want to put us in a $160 room and giving us a $40 discount making sound they make us a favor… when I call out the manager for the discrepancy between the value of the room and offered discount she becomes very defensive and not coherent. We did refuse the discount and change rooms next day but wtf… not reliable hotel ! Don’t trust them with your vacation or buisness trip. They don’t care about guests is the classic tourist TRAP.

title: NY trip
text: House keeping was very helpful in a difficult situation for my family. We loved and appreciated Despierta greatly. We had a sick child and she helped us so much by making sure we had more than enough of everything we needed.

title: Needs updating
text: The Hotel is super close and convenient to Times Square. Breakfast included is great but rooms were outdated super old carpet we had 2 king suites the square footage was not accurate and pull out couch had a super thin mattress not much bedding with it no comforter the bell man said one could be brought to us but we never received it. Bathroom super small but very clean

title: Loved our stay at Edison hotel
text: We were looking for a hotel off Times Square with great price/service value. This one did not disapoint. The rooms are nice and clean although the bathroom is a little small. The staff are all very nice and helpful. The Grab and Go breakfast were delicious and everything was easy and available. Really loved our stay!

title: Theater
text:
The hotel was close to the theater we were going too. The staff was very friendly . The breakfast voucher was a good value
The room & bathroom were small but adequate for a one night stay.
The only problem was the pipes were very loud

title: Christmas at the Edison Holel NYC
text: Excellent value for money hotel. Hotel staff very friendly and knowledgable of the attractions of NYC. Hotel is safe and very comfortable. Very close to Subway links and Times Square attractions.I'd recommend this hotel for all types of trips.

title: Super Lage, Hotel mit Charme und tolle Menschen
text: Toller  Service, tolle Reinigung der Zimmer, immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir hatten ein ruhiges Zimmer in der 11 Etage mit viel Platz. Das einzige war, das es keine Hacken für die Handtücher gab. Die Möbel könnten zum Teil ersetzt werden, da sie in die Jahre gekommen sind. Die Betten waren aber super bequem. Die Rum Bar super und das Friedman auch!

title: Experience the Edison
text: The Edison Hotel has a nostalgic feel. Upon arrival, we were greeted by a friendly Doorman and warm and welcoming Front Desk Clerks. We enjoyed 5 days at the hotel and each day had an enriching experience. The serenade of songs & wine in the lounge on Friday evening was a treat! All personnel from Housekeeping to Management was impeccable! This was our second time staying at the Edison Hotel - 228 W  47th St., NY and we look forward to staying there again.

title: Commentary
text: The hotel is very good, very clean, but very poorly insulated for a hotel in Times Square. We had trouble sleeping with the cold coming through the window and the noise was very unpleasant. When we got to our room we didn't have any slippers, so we went down to reception to ask for some. They only gave us one pair of slippers for 3 people...

title: Outstanding! Will definitely return when I'm back in the city.
text: From the moment we walked in the door, we felt so welcomed as we were greeted by several staff members that were so pleasant and accommodating. We actually arrived early and decided to let them hold our bags so we could go exploring Manhattan without having to drag all the luggage with us. It was $1 a bag to do so, so of course we took advantage of that. I want to certainly highlight one particular staff member, Fehat, as he was so helpful to us during our entire stay. He managed putting our bags away and gave us some great tips and locations to check out in the city. He also helped us to hail a cab back to the airport on departure day. Anything we needed, he made himself available for input and advice and we couldn't be more thankful for him. So, again, thank you, Fehat, for your wonderful service, hospitality, and kindness during our stay. Thank you to all the staff at the Hotel Edison, as well, as everyone was great. No complaints.

title: Hermoso hotel, limpieza 10/10 todo perfecto
text: Increible, totalmente confortable.  El personal, obviamente muy respetuosos y atentos a cada necesidad que tuviese en cualquier momento. La habitación lo más cómodo posible, la limpieza de la ñimpieza era como estar en casa.

title: Beware- Hotel is in bad shape- needs remodel
text:
The heater in our room made loud noises for 3 minutes in the middle of the night
Carpet was stained and torn
Bathtub was painted and chipping on the bottom, beneath our feet
Fixtures were so old they hardly worked- difficult getting water temparature right with the bad plumbing
Always a long line at the front desk
Although we had 3 people they only give you 2 free breakfasts per room

title: Perfect trip!
text: Everything was perfect! The room was just what we needed, comfortable beds, quiet and convenient. The location was over the top. The staff was thoughtful and accommodating. Would love to come back very soon!

title: Great stay!
text: The rooms were comfortable. Hosekeeping came in and brought us a new blanket when we called to let them know we didnt have one on the bed. The level of security made us feel safe. Having to have a room key to even get access to the elevators is a smart move! They came and cleaned our rooms daily. We had a great trip!

title: Great hotel in a great location!
text: Hotel Edison was the perfect stay for our overnight Christmas get-away!  The room was small but well laid out and clean, comfy and quiet and all we needed.  The location is excellent and the staff was very courteous and friendly.

title: Très bel hotel, trésor bien situé!
text: A  1 minute de Time square! Personel charmant, propreté 100%! Les restaurants sont tres bons et abordables. Les chambres sont très bien entretenues et tout est renouvelé à tout les jours. Je recommande sans aucun doute.

title: Exceptional
text: From valet, front desk, security to the room, turnover service women, and smiles on their faces, and were very helpful & kind. Will definitely be back. The location is absolutely perfect if you want to be in the middle of Times Square!

title: Alas time has caught upto the Edison, old out dates room, loud plumbing and dirty room
